Name: FoxyLand
About the game: Ah... love, Love... How beautifully in one word. My mind is racing, my stomach flutter butterflies, heart racing. Are you willing to do anything to give a million cherries, collect all the jewels and even save your favorite? Here's our Foxy Fox is ready to rescue his love! He sent her on a dangerous journey and without Your help Foxy to save her! Embark on an adventure filled with dangers and difficulties that You have to overcome! Complete many challenging levels, collect the gems and cherries and get to the end of the level to get three stars. Look in the shop and spend the collected cherry on new items. Open the full collection of outfits for the Fox Foxy! And if You can pass all levels in FoxyLand? We now check! Features: -Many different levels -Puzzles and Hardcore -Love story -Gamepad Support -Retro style game -Beautiful pixel art and chiptune music
